author: marcelbuainain
title: Influencers as Ambassadors Brazil
description: We want to increase the awareness of Project Catalyst in Brazil, a country that forms 46k new developers/year.
solution: We will work with 10 medium to high reach influencers (50k-300k flwrs) in the tech area in Brazil to be ambassadors and promote the project.
experience: Digital Marketing professional with 16 years of experience working in Brazil and Europe for relevant tech and consumer goods brands.
